title: DeLonghi Perfecto Indoor Grill BG24 Overview
description:
Buy DeLonghi Perfecto Indoor Grill - BG24 - http://www.abt.com/product/24143/DeLonghi-BG24.html
Shop All Wafflers & Grills - http://www.abt.com/category/759/Wafflers-Grills.html

Features:
• Die-Cast Aluminum Non-Stick Cooking Surface: Cooking surface is high-quality long lasting and easily removable for convenient dishwasher-safe cleaning. 
• Embedded Heating Element: Distributes the heat more evenly for the most consistent grilling results. And M-shaped design provides complete coverage of grill plate.
• Detachable Adjustable Thermostat: Allows you to adjust the temperature for varying types of food.
• Built-In Non-Stick Splatter Shield: surrounds the grill. One-inch splatter shield protects your countertop from grease splatter.
• Tempered Glass Lid: improves cooking by keeping food its juiciest. Its also great for keeping dinner warm after grilling. Lid is dishwasher-safe.
• Removable Non-Stick Drip Pan: is dishwasher-safe.
• Extra-Large Cooking Surface(12 x 16): Is large enough to grill a meal for the entire family.
• Cool-Touch Handles: It is safe-to-the-touch.
• Indictator Light: Lets you know when the unit is on.
• Healthy Grilling: Enjoy the flavor and health benefits of barbecue grilling right on your countertop!
• Designed And Engineered In Italy
